name: What in Carnation?
description:
You really have a bad habit of dozing off on the job, don't you... 

Before it wasn't a problem, but your new boss is a bit, shall we say; eccentric, what with him making a game out of everything from the interview process, to the pass code to the main gate. You'd think he values these sorts of games over all else, huh.

Now if only you remembered how to get out... 

Controls - 

W, A, S, D to move

Spacebar to jump

Left-click to interact

Credits - 

Made as part of a game design class by:

Connor Dalton - @connor_dalton (Lead programmer & 3D artist).

Jack Tunstall - @FlusterCluck (Lead 3D artist).
